meanings.definition: To sponsor or support jointly with another person or organization.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I are cosponsoring a charity event next week.
meanings.sent2: The two companies are cosponsoring the upcoming conference.
meanings.sent3: Cosponsoring a bake sale with aliens would be out of this world!
meanings.sent4: The sun and the moon cosponsoring the sky's beauty every day.
meanings.sent5: Cosponsoring a project can make the workload lighter and the success brighter.
